title: Jung-nam
text:
Jung-nam, also spelled Jeong-nam or Jong-nam, is a Korean masculine given name. Its meaning depends on the <a href="hanja">hanja</a> used to write each syllable of the name.
Hanja and meaning.
There are 75 hanja with the reading "<a href="Jung%20%28Korean%20given%20name%29">jung</a>" and five hanja with the reading "nam" on the South Korean government's official list of hanja which may be registered for use in given names. Some ways of writing this name in hanja include:
According to South Korean government data, Jung-nam was the <a href="List%20of%20the%20most%20popular%20given%20names%20in%20South%20Korea">eighth-most popular name</a> for newborn boys in 1945.
